description:
# Additional Identity Provider Integrations

Extend WhoDis to integrate with additional identity providers beyond AD/Graph/Genesys. Potential integrations: Duo (MFA status), UKG/Workforce management, AWS IAM (for technical staff), ServiceNow (ticketing correlation).

## Rationale
Organizations have identity data spread across many systems. Each integration increases WhoDis's value as the 'single pane of glass' for identity. Addresses market gap (gap-6) for real-time concurrent search across multiple providers. Modular integration architecture enables customer-specific extensions.

## User Stories
- As an IT admin, I want to see MFA enrollment status from Duo so that I can verify security compliance
- As an HR administrator, I want to see UKG data alongside AD data so that I can verify employee status

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Modular integration architecture with plugin-style identity providers
- [ ] Configuration UI for enabling/disabling integrations
- [ ] At least one new integration implemented (priority: UKG for HR data correlation)
- [ ] New integrations appear in search results with clear source tagging
- [ ] Integration health monitoring in admin dashboard
- [ ] Documentation for developing custom integrations
- [ ] Timeout protection and graceful degradation for new integrations
